name: Mind/Body
description:
Two roads diverge on your screen. Pick your weapon, assign your stats and choose how you want your story to unfold.

How to play-

In this game, you choose the path you take by swiping left or right. Each swipe will cost either your physical strength (body) or will be mentally taxing (mind). You’ll begin each journey able to choose from several items which you can assign to enhance either your physical or mental. You can also choose to swipe down to put them in your deck. If you swipe down on an event or enemy card you use can use these deck cards to decrease the consequences of those cards.

In the Item Phase, assign an item to your stats by swiping left or right or add it to your deck by swiping down.

In the Adventure Phase, choose whether to solve the event or enemy with either your mind or your body or weaken the card with a card from your deck. Dialogue and paths change based on the path you take.

Music -TheMoreTheNevers

Art – “Some Kirby Fan”
